message: Let's split it evenly to start. Your turn!
Take it or leave it, I'm not splitting it evenly anymore!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give you all the money!
You're not giving me enough, I'm taking a bit more this time!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up all my leverage!
I'm taking the last bit of leverage, it's now or never!
I'm going all-in, Bob. You get it all. I'm done.
